title: Tour Daily Podcast, stage 9: The kind of stage we were hoping for
content:
Tour Daily Podcast, stage 9: The kind of stage we were hoping for

Stage 9 of the Tour de France was the second day in the high mountains and clearly, the Tour de France is far from over. Except for a few of the sprinters, their Tour de France is over.

A strong four-rider breakaway took the third stage of the Giro Donne.

author: Abby Mickey
